tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Abasa, Ayah 1?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Please teach me something of what God has taught you. The Prophet Muhammad was once preaching to the chiefs of the Quraysh in Makkah, when a blind man, ‘Abdullah ibn Umm al-Maktum, arrived at the gathering and said, ‘O, Prophet of God
distractors: This verse narrates a historical event
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: If he gives serious consideration to his creation and the various natural systems in operation around him, a sense of gratitude towards his Lord will eventually develop in him
distractors: This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse narrates a historical event

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Arrogant people will have absolutely no personal worth in the Hereafter, while those who accept the Truth and bow down before it are the ones who will carry weight in the Hereafter
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
